body_html: I just came across this issue after doing a reboot. Suddenly, I got the same error as darrengarvey. Looking into tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl points out that a dummy repository is created 8_create_dummy_repository) when TF_NEED_CUDA=1 is not set. Setting and adding it to my .bashrc solves this for me.

body: I just came across this issue after doing a reboot. Suddenly, I got the same error as darrengarvey. Looking into tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl points out that a dummy repository is created 8_create_dummy_repository) when TF_NEED_CUDA=1 is not set. Setting and adding it to my .bashrc solves this for me.
